name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Internet public opinion monitoring group of a university in Sichuan
Each class has a public opinion monitor to monitor the class group, all students' space, Moments, WeChat, and Douyin.
This should not be an isolated case in the country.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
【Multiple pictures】
Recently, Nanchang Hangkong University is preparing to spend 140 million to build new dormitories for international students, which has caused dissatisfaction among students. They have protested and complained on the forum and on the campus software. Due to the strong opposition, the campus software was suspended.
Afterwards, the school convened a meeting of student representatives and said that the school will be promoted to a doctoral degree this year. If this incident leads to the failure of the promotion, all posters who expanded the discussion will be held accountable.
It is reported that the dormitory conditions of Chinese students in Nanchang Hangkong University are poor, while the dormitory for international students is not only double room with TV, but also can make fire and cook.
According to students on the forum, the international students of the school mainly come from Africa, Morocco, the Middle East, Eastern Europe and other places.
There have been international students who broke into the girls' dormitory at night before.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A classmate exposed the dormitory conditions of Chinese students on Tieba:

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Students discussing in forum

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 20, a fire broke out in the dormitory of international students of Nanchang Hangkong University due to a TV catching fire. According to the students, this was the reason for the investment in building a new dormitory for international students. However, this incident did not affect the international students. Instead, the school began to strictly investigate the illegal use of electricity in the dormitories of Chinese students, and even the power strips were not allowed.

content: There are also contributions from students from Nanchang Aerospace University

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 29, Jinan, Shandong. Wenzhuang Road demolition site. The homeowner stood on the rooftop and confronted the urban management officers downstairs. During the confrontation, the homeowner threw bricks at the excavator that was demolishing the building downstairs, but still failed to stop the demolition.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On March 30, a man suddenly jumped off the platform at Hangzhou East Station and ran on the tracks.

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"We don't share the same joys and sorrows"
On March 30, workers outside the Mankun Electronics Factory in Shenzhen, Guangdong, protested against the factory's implementation of a five-day, eight-hour work system, holding a banner that read "I want to work, I want to support my family. The company forced employees to resign by using a five-day, eight-hour work system."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
March 28 (Release) In order to promote the photovoltaic project, Mo'an Village in Ziyun County, Guizhou, forcibly occupied the villagers' land and cut down the fruit trees planted by the villagers.
The villagers on the scene confronted the fully armed comprehensive law enforcement officers

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 30, after the incident of Nanchang Hangkong University spending 140 million yuan to build dormitories for international students fermented, the official blog of Nanchang Hangkong University shared a song called "Why Not" in the Weibo Super Topic that afternoon.
Then it was deleted

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens provided the Chinese student dormitory of Nanchang Hangkong University (video uploaded in September 2023)

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, some students who originally made radical comments in the forum have begun to call on their classmates to calm down and love the school. It is suspected that they have been talked to by the school.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On March 24, a student from Guilin No. 18 Middle School was punished by the school and suspended for three days for bringing rice noodles into the campus.
The students held a "mourning" activity next to the notice to express their dissatisfaction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: March 30, Yichun, Jiangxi. The unfinished Longyue Terrace project of Country Garden has not yet resumed construction. Owners gathered together and held banners to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, a former employee of China Construction Bank revealed on Douyin that China Construction Bank strictly controls employees' public opinion.
A fan told her that she did not dare to comment on WeChat and Douyin for fear of being talked to by the leader. In addition, the bank also requires employees to buy financial products, and the grassroots employees have to pay for work, which has led to complaints from employees.
On March 30, the blogger posted a video again in response. She said that she was banned by China Construction Bank. The video she posted about China Construction Bank was removed from the platform, and even the video forwarded by the official media was removed. She also revealed that China Construction Bank is checking the social accounts of employees. A fan from Northeast China wrote to her, saying that the leader had issued a notice that she could no longer submit articles and complain to you.
In response, the blogger said that she did not do this to discredit the bank, but just hoped that through her voice, customers could know the pain points and difficulties of the bank.
